name: Super Mouse Adventure 2
description:
Super Mouse Adventure 2 is a classic platform game. Take you back to school time.

Mouse's ancestral jewel was stolen by evil monster. To take the gold coin Mouse coins start his adventure.

Control Mouse to run, jump and throw on monsters. Start your adventure,
run across five worlds as you hit it through these tricky monsters.
Filled with unforeseen obstacles, the fight to arrive at the FINAL destination. So Mouse can take back his jewel. You're ready?


Tips: Monster attack in the air, double jump during these long gaps.

Super Mouse Adventure 2 Features:
- New puzzle elements, exciting adventure
- Classic platform game and easy to control
- Beautiful graphics, lively and smooth animation
- 100 well designed levels, full of pitfalls
- Tons of delicate monsters, difficult to manage
- Custom accessories, unlock and upgrade to help you

Find hidden cafes in the secret paths, Open them,
surprise you! Note: Monster is still with the treasure. Time to take an adventure! Free download! We will run and jump!
